summary.span: 提供有关 中的 元素的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the elements within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素是唯一允许的子元素的。 elements are the only allowable child elements of a . 顺序中的元素定义了页面顺序。The order of the elements within the defines the page order. 提供以下信息中的元素而无需应用程序以加载单个页面。 provides information about the elements within a without the requiring the application to load individual pages. 依赖项属性指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]相应。The dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding . 有关详细信息元素，请参阅第 3 章的 xps *Open XML 纸张规范*下载[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示将添加的过程到。The following example shows the process of adding to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回时：The property returns a when: 1. 具有立即中定义的子[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]标记。 has an immediate child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup. 2. 已调用来设置作为子级。The has been called to set the as the child of the . 属性返回**null**时：The property returns **null** when: 1. 通过设置属性 (由指定的属性，未缓存)。The is set by the property (when specified by the property, the is not cached). 使用或返回由设置时属性。Use or to return the when set by the property. 有关详细信息元素，请参阅第 3 章的 xps *XML 纸张规范*下载[ http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx ](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx)。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 不能在 XAML 中使用此属性。You cannot use this property in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以异步方式加载和分析与此相关联的数据流。 asynchronously loads and parses the data stream associated with this . 其他线程将继续运行而完成。Other threads will continue to run while completes. 以下步骤演示了如何加载内容以异步方式：The following steps illustrate how to load the content asynchronously: 1. 创建委托并将其接收的通知添加事件。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 调用 。Call . 3. 当发生事件和调用委托时，内容已完成加载。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, the content has completed loading. 加载元素通过返回。The loaded element is returned through the . 属性。property. 有关详细信息``元素中，您可以在下获得的 XPS 规范，请参阅章 3 [XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
